org.javascool
Class JVSMain

java.lang.Object
  org.javascool.JVSMain

public class JVSMain
extends java.lang.Object

The Start Class for Java's cool It will contain all engines to start and setup Java's cool as a stand alone program, an applet or an sub-panel in an app.

Author:
Philippe Vienne

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] usage)
Used to run a JavaScool 3.3 as a standalone program.

- Starts a JavaScool "activity" which result is to be stored in a "file-name".

Parameters:
usage - java org.javascool.JVSMain [activity [file-name]]
  • activity specifies the activity to be done (its index or name).
  • file-name specifies the file used for the activity.
